report.title: Osiris tabular other - level 3
report.description: Tabular output for Osiris level 3 other classifications for a sample.
report.query: select #columns# from ( select string_agg(distinct t_l1.id::varchar, ',') as l1_term_id, string_agg(distinct t_l2.id::varchar, ',') as l2_term_id, string_agg(distinct t_l3.id::varchar, ',') as term_id, t_l1.term as "l1_term", t_l2.term as "l2_term", t_l3.term as "term", count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) as "speciescount", round( (count(distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id)::float * 100) / (select count(distinct ttlsub.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists ttlsub join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values avsub on avsub.taxa_taxon_list_id=ttlsub.id and avsub.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id join cache_termlists_terms t1sub on t1sub.id=avsub.int_value and t1sub.term = t_l1.term join cache_termlists_terms t2sub on t2sub.parent_id=t1sub.id and t2sub.term=t_l2.term join cache_termlists_terms t3sub on t3sub.parent_id=t2sub.id and t3sub.term=t_l3.term) ) as "rep", (select round(avg(rscv.int_value)*100) from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_l11 on av_l11.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and av_l11.deleted=false and av_l11.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#other_classification_attr_ids#) join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values rscv on rscv.taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and rscv.deleted=false and rscv.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#rarity_score_attr_id# join cache_termlists_terms t1sub on t1sub.id=av_l11.int_value join cache_termlists_terms t2sub on t2sub.parent_id=t1sub.id join cache_termlists_terms t3sub on t3sub.parent_id=t2sub.id #joins# where t1sub.term=t_l1.term and t2sub.term=t_l2.term and t3sub.term=t_l3.term group by t1sub.term, t2sub.term, t3sub.term ) as sqi, nullif(count(distinct case when ttd.taxon_id is null then null else ttl.taxon_meaning_id end), 0) as "cons_count", string_agg(coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation), '|' order by td.code) as "cons", av_l3.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id as "trait_attr_id" from cache_termlists_terms t_l3 join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_l3 on av_l3.int_value=t_l3.id and av_l3.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms t_l2 on t_l2.id=t_l3.parent_id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_l2 on av_l2.int_value=t_l2.id and av_l2.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms t_l1 on t_l1.id=t_l2.parent_id join taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values av_l1 on av_l1.int_value=t_l1.id and av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#other_classification_attr_ids#) and av_l1.deleted=false join (select distinct cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id from cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl #joins# ) cttl on cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_id and cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_l2.taxa_taxon_list_id and cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=av_l3.taxa_taxon_list_id join taxa_taxon_lists ttl on ttl.id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id left join (taxa_taxon_designations ttd join taxon_designations td on td.id=ttd.taxon_designation_id and td.deleted=false join cache_termlists_terms cat on cat.id=td.category_id and ( (cat.term='GB Red List' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('LC', 'NA', 'pLC', 'pNA', 'NE')) or (cat.term='GB Status' and coalesce(td.code, td.abbreviation) not in ('None', 'Not reviewed', 'Not native')) or (cat.term not in ('GB Red List', 'GB Status')) ) ) on ttd.taxon_id=ttl.taxon_id and ttd.deleted=false where (t_l1.parent_id is null or (av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id=#resource_attr_id# and t_l1.term='dung & carrion')) group by t_l1.term, t_l2.term, t_l3.term, av_l1.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id, av_l2.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id, av_l3.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id ) as sub where 1=1

joins.join: join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id=cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join cache_samples_functional s on s.website_id=o.website_id and s.survey_id=o.survey_id and s.id=o.sample_id and s.id in (#sample_id#)
join scratchpad_list_entries sle on sle.entry_id=cttl.id and sle.scratchpad_list_id in (#sample_id#)

column.name: rep
column.sql: case when sub.rep<1 then '<1' else round(sub.rep)::varchar end
